description: This file defines the AuditLog entity class for persisting audit trail entries, including fields for user actions, timestamps, entity details, and states, with indexing for efficient queries. It is used for GxP compliance auditing within a Java application using Jakarta Persistence (JPA).

classes.name: AuditLog
classes.description: Entity class representing an audit log entry with details about user actions, timestamps, and state changes for compliance and tracking in the application.

methods.name: AuditLog
methods.description: Constructor initializing AuditLog with user input and current timestamp.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the audit log entry.

methods.name: getUserId
methods.description: Returns the user ID associated with the audit entry.

methods.name: getActionType
methods.description: Returns the type of audit action performed.

methods.name: getTimestamp
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the audit log was created.

methods.name: getEntityType
methods.description: Returns the type of entity involved in the audit event.

methods.name: getEntityId
methods.description: Returns the specific entity ID involved.

methods.name: getBeforeState
methods.description: Returns the state of the entity before the action.

methods.name: getAfterState
methods.description: Returns the state of the entity after the action.

methods.name: getReason
methods.description: Returns the reason for the action.

methods.name: getErrorDetails
methods.description: Returns details of any error associated with the audit log.

methods.name: setErrorDetails
methods.description: Sets the error details for the audit log entry.
